title: Renewable Energy Research Grant
description: The International Development Fund is providing grants of up to $500,000 for research projects in renewable energy. Eligible applicants include universities and research institutions. The deadline for applications is March 15, 2025.

title: Climate Change Policy Grant
description: The Climate Action Initiative offers grants of $300,000 for policy research on climate change mitigation and adaptation strategies. Applications are open to academic institutions and NGOs. The deadline is April 30, 2025.

title: AI for Public Health Grant
description: The Global Health Fund is providing $200,000 for projects that use artificial intelligence to improve public health outcomes. Eligible applicants include researchers, universities, and health organizations. The deadline for applications is May 10, 2025.
